document_data.name: Avarin
document_data.mainbody: '''Avarin'''  was an infiltrator from the [[Cult of the Dragon]] at the [[Damaran Gate]] of [[Bloodstone Pass]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{cite book/The Rite||prologue}}
document_data.History: On the night of [[Mirtul 2]], in the {{yearlinkName|1373}}, Avarin and his comrade, [[Fodel]], opened the Damaran Gate for the [[Bandit Army]] of [[Vaasa]]. After Fodel was found out by a [[paladin]] of [[Ilmater]], the two cultists got into a fight with the paladin and other soldiers. Right before [[Damara]]n reinforcements, including [[wizard]]s, could slay them, an arriving [[Malazan]] incinerated these forces instead, allowing the two traitors to open the gate.
